Name: Citrus Martini
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Orange undertones add citrus depth to the lemon explosion.
History: Created by Dick Bradsell at Fred's, London, England, in the late 80s.
Nutrition: One serving of Citrus Martini contains 144 calories
